JobFullDesc: Facebook’s Small Business Group is looking for a Sales Manager, Small Business Engagement.  The Small Business Group (SBG) contributes directly to Facebook’s mission by connecting every small business in the world with their customers on Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and Messenger, and then helping them grow through solutions like pages, advertising, messaging, commerce and many other tools. We succeed when we help our customers grow their business. The Small Business Group at Facebook is one of two sales channels responsible for Facebook’s multi-billion-dollar advertising business. Our Small Business Team helps more than 99% of Facebook’s  10 million plus advertisers, and our potential business is even larger with more than 200 million businesses using our free tools to connect with customers.We are searching for a Small Business Engagement lead to spearhead the Small Business Sales team’s internal and external customer feedback and insight initiatives.  Within Facebook, this individual will play a key role in improving the global sales team’s existing customer feedback efforts, liaise with other teams at Facebook, such as product, who seek insights from small business advertisers in order to improve our research and insights processes as well as ensure small business success stories are identified and amplified across Facebook and various external comms efforts.  In addition, the Sales Manager, Small Business Engagement will help Small Business Sales define its external small business industry engagement strategy.  The ideal candidate will be passionate about continuously improving customer experience, strong at cross-functional communication and project execution, knowledgeable about marketing, and be able to balance the businesses goals with the needs of many cross-functional partners. At Facebook, we are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workplace.
